author: leadstories.com
vclaim:
Was 23-year-old Larry Mitchell kicked out of a Canadian movie theatre for masturbating to the character "Elastigirl" in the animated movie The Incredibles 2? No, that's not true: the story was made up by a site that posts fictional stories for entertainment purposes. It did not happen for real.

The story originated from an article published by 8Shit on July 5, 2018 titled "Man Kicked Out Of The Movies For Masturbating During The Incredibles 2" (archived here) which opened:

A man was kicked out of the movies after he was found masturbating during The Incredibles 2. The insane incident happened in Canada, where 23-year old Larry Mitchell "couldn't stop himself after watching the thickness of the Elastigirl. He was banned from coming back and was fined with 150 CAD. "The room was almost empty. I thought it was my opportunity. Everybody already watched the movie and this was the 14th time I was watching it. I simply couldn't stop myself. I had to do it.", Larry told our reporter Gary Cockburn. He even said he "might go to some other place to watch the movie again".

Users on social media only saw this title, description and thumbnail and might have confused it for a real news story:

Man Kicked Out Of The Movies For Masturbating During The Incredibles 2 A man was kicked out of the movies after he was found masturbating during The Incredibles 2.
